005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath;
007
008/**
009 * MPDY: Exceptions related to the Metapath dynamic context and dynamic
010 * evaluation.
011 */
012public class DynamicMetapathException
013    extends AbstractCodedMetapathException {
014
015  /**
016   * the serial version UID.
017   */
018  private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
019
020  /**
021   * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#ERRXPDY0002">err:MPDY0002</a>: It
022   * is a <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-dynamic-error">dynamic
023   * error</a> if evaluation of an expression relies on some part of the
024   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-dynamic-context">dynamic
025   * context</a> that is
026   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-datamodel-31/#dt-absent">absent</a>.
027   */
028  public static final int DYNAMIC_CONTEXT_ABSENT = 2;
029
030  /**
031   * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#ERRXPDY0050">err:MPDY0050</a>: It
032   * is a <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-dynamic-error">dynamic
033   * error</a> if the
034   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-dynamic-type">dynamic type</a> of
035   * the operand of a <code>treat</code> expression does not match the
036   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-sequence-type">sequence type</a>
037   * specified by the <code>treat</code> expression. This error might also be
038   * raised by a path expression beginning with "/" or "//" if the context node is
039   * not in a tree that is rooted at a document node. This is because a leading
040   * "/" or "//" in a path expression is an abbreviation for an initial step that
041   * includes the clause <code>treat as document-node()</code>.
042   */
043  public static final int TREAT_DOES_NOT_MATCH_TYPE = 50;
044
045  /**
046   * Constructs a new exception with the provided {@code code}, {@code message},
047   * and no cause.
048   *
049   * @param code
050   *          the error code value
051   * @param message
052   *          the exception message
053   */
054  public DynamicMetapathException(int code, String message) {
055    super(code, message);
056  }
057
058  /**
059   * Constructs a new exception with the provided {@code code}, {@code message},
060   * and {@code cause}.
061   *
062   * @param code
063   *          the error code value
064   * @param message
065   *          the exception message
066   * @param cause
067   *          the original exception cause
068   */
069  public DynamicMetapathException(int code, String message, Throwable cause) {
070    super(code, message, cause);
071  }
072
073  /**
074   * Constructs a new exception with the provided {@code code}, no message, and
075   * the {@code cause}.
076   *
077   * @param code
078   *          the error code value
079   * @param cause
080   *          the original exception cause
081   */
082  public DynamicMetapathException(int code, Throwable cause) {
083    super(code, cause);
084  }
085
086  @Override
087  public String getCodePrefix() {
088    return "MPDY";
089  }
090}
